short_description: boucher & co. llc. is a digital & marketing agency based in new york, united states.
long_description: for over 15 years, ceo gerard boucher and the b+c team have maximized visibility and roi to brands of all sizes. putting analytics and roi first, we're always results-focused for our clients. we are proactive, responsive, and creative, bringing strategic solutions that solve issues and build lasting results. we house some of nyc's top marketing talent, including strategic thinkers, social media masters, and innovative creatives. we meet strategic business goals to maximize roi. b+c builds social media identities and generates roi, engagement, and brand loyalty. b+c's marketing consulting services help businesses jumpstart marketing strategies or level up efforts. b+c's e-commerce experts drive sustainable e-commerce strategies that grow your bottom line. our tight-knit team offers: detailed attention from our best talent, faster turnarounds, and consistent availability. they are happy, smart, and motivated individuals who not only care about boucher + co.'s success, but also care about the success of their clients.
generated_description: boucher + co. is a digital marketing agency based in new york city. the company specializes in social media marketing, search engine optimization (seo), pay-per-click (ppc) management, e-commerce solutions, and influencer marketing. with over 15 years of experience, ceo gerard boucher and his team focus on maximizing visibility and return on investment (roi) for brands of all sizes. is known for its personalized attention, strategic perspective, and innovative solutions, leveraging a team of top marketing talent to deliver results-driven strategies.
